June 11, 1936 D Aveley Entertainment Contest
Aveley Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
aveley-entertainment-contest
None
Vicarage Field, Aveley, Essex Article in Musical Progress and Mail, p239, July 1936 headlined 'Novel Band Contest'. Each band played 20 minute programme instead of set test piece - was this the first entertainment contest? 3 bands competed.
Feb. 9, 2016, 9:33 a.m. Dec. 28, 2016, 5:16 p.m.
